name: blog
description: A blog built with Leptos and Rust

scripts.format: bun run format:frontend && bun run format:rust
scripts.format:check: bun run format:check:frontend && bun run format:check:rust
scripts.lint: bun run lint:frontend && bun run lint:rust
scripts.lint:check: bun run lint:check:frontend && bun run lint:check:rust
scripts.check: biome check --write . && cargo fmt && cargo clippy --all-targets --all-features
scripts.check:ci: biome ci . && cargo fmt --check && cargo clippy --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
